price: 10 Je leur ai dit : “Implorez le pardon de votre Seigneur qui est si Clément !
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
